archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.13: A process for managing security during and after the termination of contracts with external suppliers should be established (e.g. because the agreed contractual term ends, or contract is cancelled due to contractual disputes or an external supplier ceases trading) which includes:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
